context: I was consistently late to our meetings
letters:
Dear [Colleague's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for my consistent tardiness to our meetings. I recognize that punctuality is essential for maintaining a productive work environment, and I regret any inconvenience my lateness may have caused you.

I understand that time is valuable, and arriving late can disrupt our discussions and affect the overall workflow of our team. I take full responsibility for my actions and assure you that I am actively working to improve my time management skills to prevent this from happening in the future.

Thank you for your understanding and patience in this matter. I appreciate your professionalism and support, and I am committed to ensuring that our future meetings are more efficient and respectful of everyone's schedules.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]
